constituent: rowing, water, water droplets, water pistol, cadet, one, bend, sun, day
koohiiStory1: Bender the cadet (see frame 1172) is rowing, during some army exercise, and he´s very afraid of water (Bender is a robot).
koohiiStory2: The space cadet is in training, rowing in the water (see it splash).
words: 漕ぐ(こぐ): to row, to scull, to pedal
